known_issues: Post-login crash: "Cannot read properties of null (reading 'navigate')" likely due to navigation/routing context not mounted when redirect fires.

existing_features.title: Fix the crash "Cannot read properties of null (reading 'navigate')" by ensuring any code that calls TanStack Router navigation hooks (e.g., `useNavigate`) is rendered within the Router context and cannot execute before the router is mounted.

Add a defensive guard around the post-login redirect logic so navigation is skipped when prerequisites are not met (e.g., auth still initializing, profile not fetched, or a redirect already occurred), preventing repeated redirects and avoiding calling navigation during transient states.
